snippet.title: Sonic Advance 3 playthrough ~Longplay~
snippet.description:
This is a playthrough of Sonic Advance 3 on the Nintendo Game Boy Advance.

Advance 3 is definitely my least favourite of the Advance trilogy. It's pretty much a greatest hits collection of Dimps' less-endearing quirks: excessive springs, questionable enemy placement, and overuse of bottomless pits, while also bringing along its own key features like unfairly placed crusher blocks and tight platforming sections that don't take the control into consideration.

This video shows each level once and the ending sequence.

---

Commentary channel:
https://www.youtube.com/user/FlameHisWorld
